ai-patthana15.69:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.69:0.3_0: this is the mark of the skillful.
ai-patthana15.69:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the skillful.
ai-patthana15.69:1.1_1: Divisive the supreme skillful gives rise to unskillful qualities. No causes a condition for the corruption of skillful.
ai-patthana15.69:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.69:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.69:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.69:2.1_3: (All should be expanded as for the two reasons.)
